alert.note: Alert for Allen; Defiance; Fulton; Henry; Paulding; Putnam; Williams (Ohio) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS NorthernIndiana (Northern Indiana and Northeastern Ohio)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued January 19 at 4:25PM EST by NWS NorthernIndiana
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of Defiance, Putnam, eastern Paulding, Henry, southeastern Williams, Allen and Fulton Counties through 530 PM EST... At 424 PM EST, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from 6 miles northeast of Hicksville to near Bluffton. Movement was north at 55 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Lima, Defiance, Napoleon, Bryan, Wauseon, Delphos, Ottawa, Archbold, Bluffton, Fort Shawnee, Swanton, Paulding, Delta, Columbus Grove, Leipsic, Elida, Deshler, West Unity, Kalida and Stryker. This includes the following highways... Interstate 75 between mile markers 119 and 141. Interstate 80 in Ohio between mile markers 18 and 48. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. A Severe Thunderstorm Watch remains in effect until 700 PM EST for west central Ohio.

area.areaDesc: Allen; Defiance; Fulton; Henry; Paulding; Putnam; Williams
